channel.title: Exam Experience on Chris Neales Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Exam Experience on Chris Neales Blog

item.title: VCP5 Passed - Grasp The Nettle! (VCAP next)
item.description: I sat my VCP5-DCV last Monday (a week ago Monday now) and passed. 450/500 so I am quite chuffed. It was a great relief as I had devoted lots of lunchtimes and evenings and late nights into silly times in the morning to it. I was so relieved that I haven’t blogged or done anything out of work since! I resumed things like going to the gym at lunch times (VCP5=Fat Nealo!
